events.message: I received my order yesterday but the product is not what I expected. I would like to request a refund.
The customer's message mentioned a refund request, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
The support agent John Smith has been assigned to handle the refund request from the customer.
Hello! I am John, here to assist you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
Can you also share any photos of the product you received, so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have also attached photos showing the product which is different from the description.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate the refund process immediately. You should see the amount credited back within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for the prompt response. I appreciate your help and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
The refund has been processed and a confirmation email has been sent to your registered email address.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since you've confirmed the refund was received, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
We have sent a satisfaction survey to your email. Your feedback helps us improve our service.
